column1: ** Below: ignore whatever you have where the lowercase x's are and replace the capital X or X's with what is listed in the "Specifics"

Heated & Cooled Seat Icons on Home & Climate Screen
*Confirmed for Sync II
column7:
8 (Removes Seat Controls from Screen, Maintains Rear Controls)
6 (Adds Seat Controls to Screen, Maintains Rear Controls)
2 (Adds Seat Controls to Screen, Disables Rear Controls)

column8:
Traffic Alerts via FM Signal. U.S vehicles hav this 
turned off since Sirius Travel Link is enabled

column7:
0 (Disabled) 
8 (Adds OFF, ROCK, POP, CLASSIC, VOICE options)
column8:
Found under Sound Settings with Sync II and 
Sony Audio System

Allows for use of Navigation while in gear
Note: Sirius XM TravelLink is taken away while enabled

column7: 2 (Driver Minder Off)                                                                4 (Passenger Minder Off)                                                         0 (Both Minders Off)

column8: Might want to turn off if using Fog Lights as your DRLs

column1:
Daytime Running Light Option 
on Left Side Dash Screen
column8:
Shows via: Advanced Settings>Vehicle>Lighting. 
Haven't figured out how to make it function though like 
the F150 guys have. It's greyed out in the menu

column1: Engine and Engine Idle Hours Display on Dash
column8:
Will begin counting Engine and Engine Idle Hours starting 
at 0 from moment this is activated in the dash

column1:
Right LCD Cluster Menu Options
Type 3 Cluster
column7:
3, 7, B, F (Phone, Entertainment, Navigation options present)
0, 4, 8, C (Phone option only)
1, 5, 9, D (Navigation, Phone options only)
2, 6, A, E (Entertainment, Phone options only)
column8: Unable to find/activate Climate option thus far

column7:
0-3 (1 flash)
4,5 (2 flashes)
6,7 (3 flashes)
8,9 (4 flashes)
A,B (5 flashes)
C,D (6 flashes)
E,F (7 flashes)
column8:
Turn Signal flashes for set amount of times when bumped
Turn Signal flashes until canceled with full click
When activated, interior and exterior lights do not come on when you open the door. Lights will still flash when locking/unlocking from the remote.

column7:
0 (Disabled)
1 (DRL - 50% Low Beam)
2 (DRL - Fog Lights)
3 (DRL - Turn Signals)

column1:
Bambi Mode 
(Allows High Beams & Fog Lights to be on at same time)
Parking Lights as DRLs (with Rear Running Lights)
column8: Must still activate DRLs via line 726-11-01

column1:
Double Honk
(When exiting vehicle while running with Key Fob)

column8:
Some trucks have this enabled and some disabled from 
the factory. If you want to switch your DRLs off, this DRL
Lock needs to be turned off
